meanings.definition: (イタリア語)頭、頭部；ピン・釘などの頭
meanings.english_definition: (Italian) head; head of a pin, nail, etc.

examples.sentence: La capocchia dello spillo è molto piccola.
examples.translation: (Italian) The head of the pin is very small.
examples.english_translation: The head of the pin is very small.

etymology.value: Derived from the Italian word 'capo' (head) with a diminutive suffix.
